DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study case series include eye predominantly classic lesion ( Group 1 ; n = 52 ) eye occult lesion ( Group 2 ; n = 106 ) . Patients predominantly classic lesion receive low fluorescence photodynamic therapy ( 42 J/cm2 72 sec ) , follow , 24 hour later , 1.5 mL core par plana vitrectomy intravitreal injection dexamethasone ( 0.8 mg ) bevacizumab ( 1.25 mg ) . Patients occult lesion receive 0.4 mL core par plana vitrectomy intravitreal injection triamcinolone ( 8 mg ) bevacizumab ( 1.25 mg ) . At baseline follow-up examination , best-corrected visual acuity ( BCVA ; logMar ) , central macular thickness ( optical coherence tomography ) , intraocular pressure ( IOP ; Goldmann tonometry ) determine . In addition , need retreatment assess , adverse event monitor .
